mapper.insert: insert into board values( seq_board_table.NextVal, #{memberid}, COALESCE(#{boardimage_path, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'no_file'), 0, #{title}, #{content}, 0, 0, 0, 'N', CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{productname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{board_type}, #{nickname, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
select * from ( select 1 as sort_order, b.* from board b where b.board_type = 'notice' and b.del_info = 'N'
union all
select 2 as sort_order, b.* from board b where b.board_type != 'notice' and b.del_info = 'N'
) ordered_board order by sort_order, board_created_at desc
select * from board where ref = #{ref} and step != 0
mapper.update: update board set readhit = readhit +1 where boardidx = #{readhit}
update board set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where boardidx = #{boardidx}
update board set del_info = 'Y' where boardidx = #{idx}
